entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
